title: International Reporting
author: ''
date: '2022-11-16'
slug: international_reporting
categories: []
tags: []
images:
  - /img/cover.png
r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $1.1M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with International Reporting. The average
  contract duration was 0.79 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $128.5K. The longest
  contract was 4.08 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $1.5M.
lookup_name: 'INTERNATIONAL REPORTING'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '1.1M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '64'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '13'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '20%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '19%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '1.08'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '583.5K'
s424_mean_duration: '0.79'
s421_mean_contract_value: '128.5K'
s425_max_duration: '4.08'
s422_max_contract_value: '1.5M'
---
